metadata.title: CVE-2022-1270 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In GraphicsMagick, a heap buffer overflow was found when parsing MIFF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1270` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.4+really1.3.35-1ubuntu0.1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.4+really1.3.35-1ubuntu0.1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.4+really1.3.35-1ubuntu0.1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.4+really1.3.35-1ubuntu0.1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.4+really1.3.35-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4+really1.3.35-1ubuntu0.1').
